_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four kinds of grasping [sn45.173:1.5: Grasping at theories of a self
The purpose of developing the noble eigh: Direct knowledge of grasping at sensual pleasures
Complete understanding of grasping at views
Finishing of grasping at precepts and observances
Giving up of grasping at theories of a self
